price: 3. Ken (Ruum macxu kinnuk) baaxók fursi baaxól xayuk raqta baaxól buksumen, kaadu Ruum macxi buksumeek (kobrimeeniik) lakal fursi bukse-lon.
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
